content.en: Load forecasting algorithms: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve the accuracy of short-term load forecasting. These algorithms include Artificial Neural Networks (ANN), wavelet transformation, evolutionary algorithms, Support Vector Machines (SVM), and more. By combining these algorithms, researchers aim to enhance the accuracy of load forecasting models and improve the efficiency of electricity distribution systems.
content.da: Prognosealgoritmer for belastning: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden af kortsigtede belastningsprognoser. Disse algoritmer inkluderer kunstige neurale netværk (ANN), wavelet-transformation, evolutionære algoritmer, Support Vector Machines (SVM) og flere. Ved at kombinere disse algoritmer sigter forskere mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden af belastningsprognosemodeller og øge effektiviteten af elektricitetsdistributionssystemer.
